desc: Opossum World is a unique, possum themed educational attraction located in Napier, New Zealand. Both a local / tourist attraction and souvenir shop / gift shop. Opossum World features a vast range of New Zealand manufactured Possum and Merino fashion knitwear available for purchase online.

layout.text: Our Purely New Zealand Possum fur and fine Merino wool blend combines lightness and warmth, with softness and luxuriousness.
